creator.mobile: Mobile is currently unsupported, please access this page from a desktop to get the best experience

snackbar.element-does-not-fit: The selected element doesn't fit in its original position. Resize other elements to make room for it and try again

activities-section.file-errors: There were errors parsing the following files: { files }

import-custom-style.text: Input your MapBox username and StyleID to import the style and use it
import-custom-style.style-name: Style name (how you want it to be called)

data-graph-section.no-activities: To enable the options in this section, please first add some activities in the 'Activities' section

disable-customization-dialog.text: Disabling customization will reset all dragged and resized elements, are you sure you want to continue?

save-adventure.text: To capture your adventure in maximum resolution, it will be resized in the background before it is captured. The full capture will take several seconds. Do you wish to proceed?
save-adventure.generated-image-text: Here is the image that was generated, take a look and see if you want to keep it
